tool_description: Optimizes delivery routes for multiple packages to minimize travel time, fuel costs, and maximize delivery efficiency while considering vehicle constraints.

delivery_addresses.description: Array of delivery addresses to optimize

package_sizes.description: Size/weight of each package in units

error_messages: Empty delivery addresses: At least one delivery address must be provided.
Invalid starting location: Starting location address is required and must be valid.
Invalid vehicle capacity: Vehicle capacity must be a positive number.
Mismatched array lengths: Package sizes array must have the same length as delivery addresses array.
Capacity exceeded: Total package sizes exceed vehicle capacity.
Too many addresses: Maximum of 50 addresses can be optimized in a single route.
usage: Provide delivery addresses, starting location, vehicle capacity, and corresponding package sizes to generate an optimized delivery route.

fuel_cost_estimate.description: Estimated fuel cost for the route
